name: Devil's Deck 恶魔秘境
detailed_description:
Hello everyone!
"Devil's Deck 恶魔秘境" is an Indie Roguelike game based on cards deck building, which has a unique honeycomb map.
The game's battle rules are derived from our other product "Wuxing Master 五行师(CCG)", so it is quite different from other similar games and I hope to bring you a new game experience!

Here, you will walk through the devil's territory which is like a honeycomb, and for every step you will be faced with a wealth of choices.
Every 4 steps, there is a battle against the devil's minions. If you did good enough, the final devil will come!
Time is limited, try to strengthen yourself before the devil comes!
